module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: The Skrill fee structure is a competitive 1.2%+0.29 and 1%+0.29 for Instant bank transfer. * Fees apply to new merchants only. From 1st March 2021. *Fees apply to new merchants only within restricted industry sectors. Terms and conditions apply - https://www.skrill.com/en/footer/terms-conditions/fees-reduction-promotion/Free and quick set upActivate credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationTake advantage of the Skrill multicurrency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store. With millions of users in over 200 markets, PayPal is one of the most preferred and trusted brands in the world.
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any set-up fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 88.7%* thanks to our mobile optimised solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay for their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services. A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more transactions you receive the less it costs you. *Conversion rate measured by Comscore online panel, Q4 2017. Analysed shopping behaviour at 20 large merchant sites across categories, utilising its panel of 1 million US consumers.

module.name: cashondelivery
module.description: Accept cash on delivery payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept cash on delivery payments

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your business, get help to make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep your store up-to-date: benefit from the latest features and improvements available.Protect your store: stay up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file with this module, and keep it up-to-date.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Optimize your SEO: enhance your search results on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo, etc.) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell..
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell...
module.additional_description: The all-in-one tool : synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial

module.name: emarketing
module.displayName: Microsoft Ads, Google Ads, Social Media by emarketing
module.description: Increase your sales via Microsoft Ads, Google Shopping and Social Media with the cloud-based solution from emarketing. The emarketing module is the automated premium variant for every online retailer
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Increase your sales via Microsoft Ads, Google Shopping and Social Media with the cloud-based solution from emarketing. The emarketing module is the automated premium variant for every online retailer.
module.additional_description: Microsoft voucher available until 30.12.22 - Spend 50,00€/Offer 250,00€. Different modules can be selected, so the online trader decides which tools are most important for him. The individual circumstances and specific requirements are in the foreground. The emarketing plug-in takes over all technical tasks automatically.- Mapping of campaigns for, among others, Microsoft Advertising (incl. vouchers)- Data feed management - Conversion tracking- Creation of product groups- Analysis of competitiveness (e.g. price comparison data)- Comparison Shopping Services (CSS) An annual fee is charged for the emarketing plugin. The respective modules are available in the form of monthly, half-yearly or an annual subscription (pay 10 for 12 months).  emarketing AGsales@emarketing.com+49 89/189 465 60

badge.label: Save time: Partner of the year

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically.
module.additional_description: Sell more than ever :78% of all online-buyer-decisions are made on marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or CdiscountThese are the most important distribution channels to increase your sales dramatically. Use your Prestashop in combination with the magnalister addon and make your store a distribution, inventory- and order-management-system. ​magnalister is the ultimate connection between PrestaShop and eBay, Amazon & Co.  4 main processes supports your daily work:- Upload products directly from PrestaShop to the marketplaces- Orders are imported automatically from the marketplaces into PrestaShop- Automatic stock and price synchronization- Automatic transmission of status like "shipped" or "paid" Many additional features like variation-transmission or usage of different price groups makes selling more easy. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period. After the free trial, magnalister costs starting from 29 EUR excl. tax.

module.name: advancedeucompliance
module.description: This module helps European merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module helps European merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws.

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty, including Pay now, Pay later, and Financing options. The latest version 2.1.27 and v1
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty, including Pay now, Pay later, and Financing options. The latest version 2.1.27 and v1.7+ also include Klarna’s On-Site Messaging Feature.
module.additional_description: Klarna Checkout has everything you need to convert browsers into happy customers – making shopping easier than ever. Offer Klarna Checkout for a seamless, mobile-optimised solution, requiring minimum input from your customers. By investing in a checkout solution that is always kept up to date – with the customer experience in mind – you’ll get more customers who will buy more and do it more often. The On-Site Messaging feature continues the smooth journey, increasing risk-free sales through tailored messaging and showing your customers available financing options while they’re still shopping. Advertising the ability to pay later, before checkout improves sales.  On-Site Messaging provides customized messaging ranging from banners promoting your partnership with Klarna and availability of payment options, to personalized promotions on product or cart pages. Customers are identified from their first interaction, so the shopping experience can be tailored to suit their needs. Klarna deliversOne-click repeat purchasesGlobal support, local optimisationKlarna absorbs all credit and fraud riskAn easy integration Your benefitsBoost conversionIncrease average order valueSupport and guidanceOptimised user experience To get the credentials you need to get started with Klarna Checkout, sign up here: https://eu.portal.klarna.com/signup/?products=kco&platform=prestashop

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: At IONOS you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At IONOS you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA.  Please click here to benefit from the UK special offer and here if you are based in Canada
module.additional_description: 24/7 expert support offering practical help with the application you're usingMaximum availability of your website thanks to georedundant hosting in two geographically separate data centers

module.name: smartsupp
module.displayName: Chatbots, live chat, video recordings - Smartsupp
module.description: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce. Smartsupp combines live chat, chatbots, and video recordings into an affordable package that saves you time and resources in order to help you turn your visitors into loyal customers.
module.additional_description: Drive your online sales through conversational ecommerce. Smartsupp helps businesses deliver a personalized online shopping experience and drives sales by combining live chat, chatbots and video recordings, allowing you to genuinely connect with your customers to better identify their needs.  As one of the most popular ecommerce solutions in the world with over 50,000 active webshops and websites, Smartsupp offers:A one-and-only combination of live chat, chatbots, and video recordings–automate responses to repetitive questions, deliver personal service when needed and see how and where you can improve your conversion rate.  Access to real-time visitor lists enriched with e-commerce data–see who is browsing your webshop, which products they are interested in and proactively start a conversation to assist you in making a sale. A FREE Mobile App–be more accessible to your customers with Smartsupp’s app for iOS and Android phones so that you can reply to visitor inquiries even when you are in the warehouse or on the go.  What our users say about us? "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl “70 % of our orders comes through live chat”-Irena ŽIROVNICKÁ, Customer care team leader Unuo Design

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creati
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creation, re-entering credit card information, and typing their billing and shipping addresses. The performance is continually optimized by Amazon’s technology, learnings, and best practices.
module.additional_description: Reduce friction at checkout: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks. Amazon automatically recognizes when shoppers have an active Amazon login, so they don’t need to sign in again.Enhance brand trust: The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust, and that trust halo extends to Amazon [1]. Furthermore, the Amazon Pay A-to-Z Guarantee helps raise customer confidence with buying online.Delivery Notifications: Proactively alert customers on the arrival status of physical goods orders via Amazon Alexa [1]Rest assured with advanced fraud protection: An active base of online shoppers also helps reduce decline handling and fraud risk.Make it easier for international shoppers to buy: Multi-currency support reduces friction in the checkout process by maintaining the local currency experience across the shopping journey and helps customers avoid currency conversion fees from their credit card issuer or bank.Easily and flexibly integrate Amazon Pay into your store: Built-in support for strong customer authentication as required under Payment Services Directive (PSD2). With 91% of Amazon Pay customers saying they would use Amazon Pay again and hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers already enabled for Amazon Pay, it can help you increase sales [2]. [1]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [2]:Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

module.name: packlink
module.description: Packlink is a global shipping management platform for eCommerces and Marketplaces. This free tool helps you optimize your orders’ delivery by streamlining your whole shipping processes
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Packlink is a global shipping management platform for eCommerces and Marketplaces. This free tool helps you optimize your orders’ delivery by streamlining your whole shipping processes.
module.additional_description: Packlink PRO is your best ally through your ecommerce journey! From importing orders and printing labels, to picking and packing orders, this platform centralizes all shipping steps to help you streamline and optimize your whole delivery process. It offers you direct access to our market-leading selection of over 350 shipping services and to a large portfolio of carriers, giving you all the necessary tools to easily meet the needs of your customers. Over 20.000 online stores already use Packlink PRO, saving up to 70% on every sending with the Packlink PRO shipping module! Try it for free now!

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Increase your conversion rate, fight fraud, and go global as you scale with the easiest way to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate, fight fraud, and go global as you scale with the easiest way to accept online payments. ​Install Stripe's module on your PrestaShop online store and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Increase checkout completion by accepting credit and debit cards in 135+ currencies, wallet payments like Apple Pay and Google Pay, and local payment methods like SEPA Direct Debit,  iDEAL, Bancontact, P24, EPS, Giropay, FPX, Alipay, and more. Fight fraud with machine learning that trains on hundreds of billions of data points. Stripe processes payments from 195 countries and millions of businesses. Even if a card is new to your business, there’s an 89% chance it’s been seen on the Stripe network before. Stripe supports PSD2 regulations in Europe and is SCA-ready. Stripe scans every transaction to dynamically trigger additional authentication only when required.  Rely on a trusted and secure payment provider. Stripe has been audited by a PCI-certified auditor[0] and is certified to PCI Service Provider Level 1. This is the most stringent level of certification available in the payments industry. Our pricing is fully transparent. No setup fees, monthly fees, or hidden fees. You only pay for successful transactions. View pricing at our website[1]. Custom pricing available for companies with large payments volume or unique business models. Feel free to contact our Sales team[2]. [0] http://www.visa.com/splisting/searchGrsp.do?companyNameCriteria=stripe[1] https://stripe.com/pricing[2] https://stripe.com/contact/sales

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your visual identity or type of business
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your visual identity or type of business.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Easy import purchased modules: import the zip file into the module’s configuration interface and you’re all set! You can use your new email template immediately.Manage your email content: content and translations automatically retrieved for traditional transaction emails (more than 30 templates).Access your emails in one-click: store default email templates in PrestaShop and purchased templates.

module.name: mailchimppro
module.description: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses.  Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses.  Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go. Increase your revenue potential by adding the Mailchimp module for free.
module.additional_description: Increase your revenue potentialWhen you connect your Prestashop store to Mailchimp, you unlock features that can help you increase revenue and drive conversion. Mailchimp’s all-in-one marketing platform makes it easy to build and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns that drive sales. Increase traffic to your site and drive repeat purchasesMailchimp tools not only help you increase traffic to your site but with the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) features you can start building stronger relationships with your customers with content that means something to them. Understand what works so you can amplify your effortsWith a connected store, you bring your ecommerce and marketing data into one centralized place. This allows you the ability to understand the ROI of your marketing efforts so you can best optimize your marketing strategy.

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way.
module.additional_description: Once connected to your PrestaShop Addons account with this module, you:will benefit each week from an e-commerce tip, that is a tip to follow related to the e-commerce calendar, which you will find directly on your dashboard (ex: when and how to prepare for Black Friday, back to school promotions, etc.)protect your store by staying up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addonstake advantage of new features added to modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons

module.name: coingate
module.displayName: Accept Bitcoin and 70+ Cryptocurrencies with CoinGate
module.description: Accept cryptocurrency payments in your PrestaShop store with the CoinGate module - a fully automated payment processing and invoicing solution for online stores
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Accept cryptocurrency payments in your PrestaShop store with the CoinGate module - a fully automated payment processing and invoicing solution for online stores.
module.additional_description: How does the CoinGate module work? Once the CoinGate module is set up, a new payment method appears in your PrestaShop store's checkout, allowing customers to pay with Bitcoin (+ Lightning⚡), Litecoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin, XRP, and 70+ other cryptocurrencies and tokens. Price your merchandise in any national currency–the CoinGate module sources real-time exchange rates automatically and accurately reflects them during a customer's payment cycle.  Users can also access orders' data tracking, a refund system, invoice customization options, permission-based account management, API access, and custom payouts. Best of all, the CoinGate module also can exchange all received cryptocurrencies for something else during the payment process. Take recurring payouts in BTC, originally received coins, or a single fiat currency, such as EUR, USD and GBP, directly into a bank account.  Why use this module to accept cryptocurrency payments? Accept +70 cryptocurrencies and tokens at once;Collect payments instantly from anywhere in the world;Mitigate risks of cryptocurrency market volatility;Get rid of multiple unnecessary middle-men;Gather and share fewer data about your customers;No more fraudulent chargebacks on purchases;Get the attention of more customers;Gain a competitive advantage in your respective industry. If all that sounds nice, the CoinGate payment gateway might be the right solution for you.  Sign up for a CoinGate business account to get started!  CoinGate charges merchants a flat payment processing service fee of 1%.

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: cedwish
module.description: The official Wish integration makes it easier than ever to list and sell your products on the world's leading mobile e-commerce platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The official Wish integration makes it easier than ever to list and sell your products on the world's leading mobile e-commerce platform.
module.additional_description: The Wish module will empower you to become a global seller with ease—just create a single product listing to reach customers in more than 100 countries.  Wish is the most downloaded app globally for three of the past four years, Wish provides merchants with easy access to more than 100 million monthly active users across the globe (source: Sensor Tower). Unlike most marketplaces more than 70% of sales on Wish do not originate from search queries. Wish’s unique algorithm helps find the users that are most likely to buy your products—and we place your products front and center for them.

module.name: klarnapaymentsofficial
module.description: Klarna Payments​ are standalone payment methods that complement your checkout with a Klarna hosted widget located in your existing checkout. The latest version 2.0.8 and v1.0
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Payments​ are standalone payment methods that complement your checkout with a Klarna hosted widget located in your existing checkout. The latest version 2.0.8 and v1.0.7 and any future versions, also include Klarna’s On-Site Messaging Feature.
module.additional_description: Klarna Payments enhances your current checkout, offering flexible payment options that empower your customers, giving them choice to pay directly, by invoice or using financing. The Klarna products are Pay now, Pay later and Financing, and all increase conversions and take the friction out of shopping. And that’s not all. No matter which Klarna option shoppers choose, you get paid when that goods ship. The On-Site Messaging feature continues the smooth journey, increasing risk-free sales through tailored messaging and showing your customers available financing options while they’re still shopping. Advertising the ability to pay later, before checkout improves sales.  On-Site Messaging provides customized messaging ranging from banners promoting your partnership with Klarna and availability of payment options, to personalized promotions on product or cart pages. Customers are identified from their first interaction, so the shopping experience can be tailored to suit their needs. Klarna delivers:- Global Compliance- Absorbs all credit and fraud risk- Local support across Europe Your benefits:- Increase in conversions and order value- Reach a new audience- Always get paid

module.name: sumuppaymentgateway
module.description: Card payments made simple with SumUp.  SumUp's vision is to create a world where all businesses can be successful doing what they love
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Card payments made simple with SumUp.  SumUp's vision is to create a world where all businesses can be successful doing what they love. SumUp supports merchants with tailor-made business tools created specifically for SMEs.
module.additional_description: Provides a fast and easy payment method suitable to your customers. Attractive and trustworthy user interfaceSeamless and fast registration, and easy configuration No hidden feesSafe and reliable paymentsLower chargeback rates thanks to 3D-SecureAll payments processed with SumUp in one sales history (both offline and online)Get a free SumUp Business Account to manage all your funds easilyReceive a free MasterCard with your merchant account for easy access to your fundsEasy-to-use SumUp App to manage all of your payment options and finances in one placeConnect to hundreds of integrations through the SumUp Partners platform  SumUp gives businesses a toolkit to run their entire operation. The extensive product suite includes stylish card readers, SumUp Business Account and Card, Online and remote payment options, invoicing, and point-of-sale registers.  To start using SumUp with your Prestashop website simply download the free module and connect it with your SumUp account. The attractive and customizable user interface of the module provides your customers with convenient, fast and easy card acceptance.

module.name: ps_checkout
module.description: Accept and manage all types of payments (credit or debit card, PayPal and local payment methods), easily and securely, directly from the PrestaShop interface, and in a single module
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept and manage all types of payments (credit or debit card, PayPal and local payment methods), easily and securely, directly from the PrestaShop interface, and in a single module.
module.additional_description: SimplicityAll-in-one interface, easy to handle and useManage transactions and historyManage refunds (partial and total) Accounting reconciliation simplified   ConversionWide range of commonly used payment methods including credit and debit card, PayPal wallet & relevant local payment methodsFully responsive: adapts to all types of screens and browsersThanks to the Express Checkout, you can add a fast checkout button on product or cart pages, to foster spontaneous purchase. Allowing visitors to buy with fewer clicks, this feature can boost conversion up to 80%.InternationalAccepting payments from 190+ countries 100+ currencies accepted Security100% secure transactions (3D Secure 2) Powerful anti-fraud and risk control tool Preferential and Transparent Pricing (per transaction)No installation costsNo monthly feesOne of the lowest commission rates on the market.   France Spain ItalyUKCredit cards1.2% + €0.351.2% + €0.351.2% + €0.351.2% + £0.30Local solutions1.2% + €0.351.2% + €0.351.2% + €0.351.2% + £0.30PayPal2.9% + €0.352.9% + €0.353.4% +€0.352.9% + £0.30American Express3.5%3.5%3.5%3.5%International feesEurozone: + 0.5% ; Rest of the world: + 2.0%Anti-fraud toolFree Find here Pricing for Belgium, Netherlands, Luxembourg, USA ...

module.name: glotio
module.displayName: Glotio - Translate your PrestaShop in over 50 languages
module.description: Glotio allows you to automate the translation of your entire PrestaShop, you will save time and you can start selling worldwide with a few clicks right away
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Glotio allows you to automate the translation of your entire PrestaShop, you will save time and you can start selling worldwide with a few clicks right away.
module.additional_description: Facilitates international salesTranslate your store automatically Glotio is much more than a simple automatic translator tool, is specialized in PrestaShop and it automatically translates many parts of your online store with no need to import/export texts.Multiply your sales, translating your e-commerce shop in more than 50 languages ​​and selling in many countries!  How does it work:Download and install our free module. In the PrestaShop marketplace you can find our certified module. Download it for FREE and create your account in just two minutes.We analyze your store for translatable content. Our simple wizard will guide you in a few steps through the process necessary for Glotio to track your PrestaShop for translatable material.Indicate which languages you want to translate your PrestaShop in. Once we know what content is available to carry out the translation, you can tell us which languages you want us to do it in. The first translation to the 1st language is FREE! Glotio updates your translations whenever you want. The languages that you have translated in our panel will be updated automatically or manually at the time you want, so that you always have your online store updated. KEY TOOLSFind and replace: You can always find some word or string of words that you prefer to replace by another. With this tool it will now be a piece of cake. Excluded words: You will most likely want to not translate certain words, such as brands or suppliers. You can automatically add them to the exclusion list. Smart Dictionary: No one knows the products you sell as much as you or your team, so you can teach Glotio how to translate certain words. What does that product provide you?• Boost your SEO: Glotio respects all the SEO of your default language, in this way you can start the organical positioning in any country you decided to sell using their native language.• International Marketing: Exportable data feed in all languages ​​to start marketing campaigns in new countries and multiply your visits. The translations are saved in your PrestaShop, so you can create a data feed in the different languages.• Increase the conversion ratio because you sell in the language of your customers.• Translate your entire online store (catalog, products, categories, attributes, characteristics, manufacturers, suppliers, attachments, etc.) into more than 50 languages ​​in record time.• Suitable for everyone. No programming knowledge or expert PrestaShop or HTML / CSS required.• You save time. Translate your online store quickly.• You pay only what you translate, with no monthly fees.

module.name: ps_accounts
module.description: Prestashop Account
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Prestashop Account

module.name: izettleconnector
module.description: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps.
module.additional_description: Create an Zettle product library in secondsThis module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps. It synchronizes your product stock quantity and product prices continuously. So your product stock is kept up to date no matter if you are selling a product via Zettle on the point of sale or in your online shop. Easy product exportYou can either export your complete PrestaShop product library to Zettle or choose a specific category. Also, you can export single products to Zettle. During the export configuration you can choose if price and stock quantity are part of the export or if you just want to export the products to create the Zettle product library. Automatic synchronizationEverytime an item is sold in your store or online, the product data gets synchronized between PrestaShop and Zettle. The module is providing full control how the synchronization is performed. Automatically, manually or by setting up a cronjob.If you are using the manual sync, you will get a full overview of the product data changes before you perform the update. If an error occurs during synchronization, you will receive a push email notification. Import Zettle orders to PrestaShopOrders that have been completed on Zettle will be imported to PrestaShop automatically. This module enables you to have all orders in one place. Synchronization historyYou can review all completed product export and product synchronization events. SecurityThe communication between Zettle and PrestaShop is based on the Zettle API. Any critical credentials are encrypted using the latest industry standard.  The services include: Zettle, a member of the PayPal family, is on a mission to help small businesses succeed in a world of giants – enabling people like you to accept in-person cash, cards, contactless and mobile payments. It also helps you to easily organise your products, track stock levels and monitor sales. The Zettle Reader:The Zettle reader 2 is super-fast and processes in-person contactless payments from credit cards, debit cards and American Express, as well as payments via Apple, Samsung and Google Pay. The Zettle Go app:The point-of-sale for any business. Seamlessly integrated with the Zettle Reader, it let’s you run your business – on the go or over the counter. Your shopfront and back office – all in one easy-to-use system.

module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features&q
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features" tab). The PS EventBus module enables the synchronisation of technical and non-personal data between your shop and these other modules installed on your shop. This synchronisation is necessary for the good operation of the modules concerned. Uninstalling the PS EventBus module may cause these modules to crash or even stop working completely.

module.name: usercentrics
module.description: Comprehensive and easy to configure, this module enables your store to become compliant with the latest data privacy regulations applicable to your country and to assure your customers that you are se
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: Comprehensive and easy to configure, this module enables your store to become compliant with the latest data privacy regulations applicable to your country and to assure your customers that you are securely storing and managing their data.
module.additional_description: This module will help you inform your online store visitors about the cookies and trackers installed on your website. You can easily collect, manage and store their consent while also achieving GDPR cookie compliance. Usercentrics GDPR cookie banner provides: a fast and easy way to help you achieve GDPR compliancea user-friendly and fully automated process to collect, manage and document your website visitors’ consentprotection from data privacy violations for your store

module.name: growaffiliate
module.displayName: Grow by Tradedoubler - Easy Affiliate Marketing
module.description: Grow is a self-service, performance-based, affiliate marketing solution for small businesses and start-ups wanting to increase online visibility, traffic, and product sales
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Grow is a self-service, performance-based, affiliate marketing solution for small businesses and start-ups wanting to increase online visibility, traffic, and product sales. Download our module for a 1 stop shop for all your technical requirements
module.additional_description: Grow is built on Tradedoubler's affiliate network of over 180,000 active affiliates. The Grow PrestaShop Module allows you to set up and manage your Grow affiliate program natively, within your PrestaShop store. When you join Grow, we provide you with the tools you need to search for and recruit your own affiliates from our established partner network. Giving you access to over 180,000 partners, who are ready and waiting to promote your business. The Grow PrestaShop module  will take care of all your technical requirements by ensuring that your affiliate tracking is set-up quickly and correctly. This module will also automatically create your product feed to the best standard and retrieve your existing discount codes so that they’re ready for your partners within minutes of signing up. With Grow affiliate marketing has never been easier. Grow is 100% focused on results, you only pay for the sales that your partners bring. All your activity will be presented in your PrestaShop module, with useful statistics and information to provide insights on traffic, conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), impressions, sales information and much, much more.

module.name: taxdoo
module.displayName: TAXDOO: Automated VAT and Financial Accounting
module.description: Taxdoo offers you an all-in-one solution
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Taxdoo offers you an all-in-one solution. Automated data collectionMonitoring and evaluating your transactions for tax liabilities across the EULocal VAT registrationsPreparing your tax filings (OSS, Intrastat, Proforma)DATEV for financial audits
module.additional_description: With this module, online merchants can maintain an overview of all VAT processes throughout the EU and UK. With seamless integration, your transaction data is automatically collected and evaluated every day– manual uploads are not necessary.Our tax engine is always updated with the current EU/UK VAT rates and evaluates every sale, return and transfer of goods for tax compliance.As the only provider of VAT and financial accounting in the market, we are able to deliver consistent VAT filings and DATEV reports, thereby eliminating the risk of errors from working with different platforms. Taking into account your product returns, we also provide an automated corrections report along with your VAT filings without any need for manual work/spreadsheets. On request, our local tax advisor network takes care of all your VAT registrations and corresponding VAT filings throughout the EU and UK. This means that you, as well as your tax consultant, can maintain an overview at all times as the VAT processed transaction data can be effortlessly transferred to financial accounting. Submitting VAT returns via One-Stop-Shop is also made easy with Taxdoo. A comprehensive all-in-one VAT and Accounting solution for all eCommerce merchants!

module.name: ritmo
module.displayName: RITMO. Financing Solutions for Online Sellers
module.description: RITMO is the all-in-one growth platform for your online store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: RITMO is the all-in-one growth platform for your online store. Get up to €3M in 24 hours to help you scale your business through our growth capital solution, or improve your working capital cycle through our invoice financing solution.
module.additional_description: Access financing solutions tailored to your e-commerce business needs: Growth CapitalUp to €3M to boost growth by investing in online marketing campaigns, expanding to new markets, launching new products…Pre-approval in real-time. Your offer in less than 24 hours after your accounts are connected.Pay as your sales grow. You only pay a small percentage of your future income. No fixed date for repayment: we adapt to the performance of your store. Invoice FinancingGet your invoices paid directly to your suppliers by simply uploading them to our platform.Extend payment terms and improve your working capital and cash flow cycle.Increase your purchasing power and get better discounts from your suppliers.

module.name: tidiolivechat
module.displayName: Chatbots, Live Chat and Messenger by Tidio
module.description: Tidio is a customer service platform that allows you to actively generate more sales thanks to a live chat solution boosted with chatbots. It seamlessly integrates with Messenger, Instagram and email
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Tidio is a customer service platform that allows you to actively generate more sales thanks to a live chat solution boosted with chatbots. It seamlessly integrates with Messenger, Instagram and email.Trusted by 300,000+ businesses
module.additional_description: Provide the best possible customer service and increase your sales. Tidio is a multichannel customer support tool for instant communication with your website visitors and customers. With live chat and chatbots, you can answer their questions in an instant and solve problems faster. Using Tidio will improve your customer’s experience, increase their loyalty and as a result, increase your conversion rate. And yes - it is available for free. What makes Tidio so effective in generating sales? As many as 75% of online customers said they expect help within five minutes. Integrate your live chat, email inbox, Messenger, and Instagram into one multichannel communicator and answer your customers in an instant!Ready-to-use chatbot templates for answering repetitive questions and performing simple tasks. What’s more—we have used machine learning to make your bot understand your customer’s intentions.Actionable statistics that show how effective and useful for your customer are your chatbotsLive visitors’ list that shows who is visiting your website in real-time and allows you to monitor which part of your website they are browsing What differentiates Tidio? Simplicity—it takes only 5 minutes to install the chat widget and start conversations with your customers300.000 businesses generated 20M leads and $500M additional revenueUnique chatbot builder - 100% codeless.Built-in chatbot templates empowered with AICustomizable, beautifully designed widgetIntegrations with email, Messenger, InstagramA free mobile app for iOS and AndroidExcellent customer support available for you 24/5 Sample tactics you can implement in 5 minutes to boost your sales: Stop 60% of customers from abandoning their carts by offering a discount or free shippingWelcome every website visitor and encourage them to make purchases by giving personalized discounts o informing them about special offersSend a personalized message to those who want to leave your websiteWelcome returning visitors and customers with a personalized messageMonitor visitor activity and recommend best-selling productsRun upselling bot to increase the average order value Numbers behind Tidio The 4th most popular live chat solution with over 300.000+ active users20M leads generated and $500M additional revenue with TidioThousands of positive reviews 20+ built-in, ready to use chatbots24/5 support to solve your problems and help you improve your business with Tidio

module.name: ritmoinsights
module.description: Growth analytics platform for e-commerce entrepreneurs.RITMO Insights helps e-commerce entrepreneurs make business decisions by analyzing their financial, revenue, marketing, and cash flow metrics
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Growth analytics platform for e-commerce entrepreneurs.RITMO Insights helps e-commerce entrepreneurs make business decisions by analyzing their financial, revenue, marketing, and cash flow metrics.
module.additional_description: Save TimeConnect all your technical and business stack in less than 5 minutes and enjoy the pleasure of having all your KPIs in one place. AnalyzeFocus on data analysis and say goodbye to spending hours building complex visualizations. AutomateForget about extracting data and updating spreadsheets by hand. We take care of everything. Save moneySave yourself the cost of third-party tools to extract the metrics that really matter to your business.

module.name: codisto
module.description: Convert your PrestaShop store into a global omnichannel commerce platform with Codisto! Leveraging your existing PrestaShop processes, Codisto automates your catalog, inventory, and order management o
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Convert your PrestaShop store into a global omnichannel commerce platform with Codisto! Leveraging your existing PrestaShop processes, Codisto automates your catalog, inventory, and order management on the world’s leading online marketplaces.
module.additional_description: Codisto is ‘launch ready’ meaning there is no re-platforming and no data source migration required. Focus on growing your PrestaShop brand, add Codisto and sell more on global marketplaces today! This module is free to download and install but requires a paid monthly subscription for ongoing integration services after the 14-day free trial period. For more details on pricing, see below. With the installation of ONE module, list and sell on:Any global Amazon site (All global sites, categories, and currencies supported)Any global eBay site (All global sites, categories, and currencies supported)Any global Google site (All global sites, categories, and currencies supported)Walmart USA+ more to come! With Codisto, you can:Create new channel listings and sync product details, prices & inventory directly from your PrestaShop back office to global marketplacesAutomatically transfer orders and sync shipment status between sales channels and PrestaShop for easy fulfillment.Sync PrestaShop product values, or specify custom values for any field such as price, inventory, title, or description.Sell confidently with real-time sync on products, inventory, and orders!
